title: Pelicans G Evans has arthroscopic surgery
text: Pelicans G Evans has arthroscopic surgery Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) NEW ORLEANS (AP) New Orleans Pelicans guard Tyreke Evans has had arthroscopic surgery on his right knee. The New Orleans Pelicans announced on Tuesday that guard Tyreke Evans underwent successful arthroscopic surgery on his right knee.
